entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
